Just contacted to the following number, 
Cell +977 9851070503  
The person says that the signboard was near the Nepal India border during Lumbini festival 
to attract the tourist in the area and later was brought to the existing place. 
The person on the phone said people who shifted the signboard here were by workers who couldnтАЩt read or write and he said there was no other motivation. 
Anyway, he said the board was removed now (2019/1/14) 
Need to check the status though. Thanks Ravi ji for the news.
